title: Augusta County: John Quincy Adams Nadenbousch to Hester J. Nadenbousch, July 13, 1864
summary: Nadenbousch writes his wife and announces his safe arrival back in Staunton. He expresses pleasure that Freddy has come with him, and says he is doing well. He mentions many items that he forgot to bring, which he would now like sent. He also discusses household and financial matters.
keywords: Family, Home Front, Women, American Civil War
